publ: by City of Torrance Office of Emergency Services
name: TorrancePreparednessFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Torrance Preparedness Facts”
”Alexa, start Torrance Preparedness Facts”
”Alexa, ask Torrance Preparedness Facts for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: torrance preparedness facts
des: Ask Alexa for important facts about how to stay prepared before, during, and after the event of an earthquake. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. Keep informed, be prepared, and stay safe.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
